original_text: These are they that went over Jordan in the first month, when it had overflown all his banks; and they put to flight all them of the valleys, both toward the east, and toward the west.
korean_text: 정월에 요단 강 물이 모든 언덕에 넘칠 때에 이 무리가 강물을 건너서 골짜기에 있는 모든 자에게 동서로 도망하게 하였더라

sentences.original_text: These are they that went over Jordan
when it had overflown all his banks
sentences.korean_translation: 강물이 모든 제방을 넘쳐 흘렀을 때

sentences.original_text: and they put to flight all them of the valleys
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 골짜기의 모든 사람들을 도망치게 했으며

sentences.original_text: both toward the east, and toward the west
